data.sentence: The word وَزَيْتُونًا comes from the root ز ي ت and is associated with the meanings: oil, olive-oil, olive-tree.

data.meanings: to sift, send down, snow, drizzle, cloud, select, pick out the best of. nakhal lahuu alnasiihaten - to give earnest advice.
data.sentence: The word وَنَخْلًا comes from the root ن خ ل and is associated with the meanings: to sift, send down, snow, drizzle, cloud, select, pick out the best of. nakhal lahuu alnasiihaten - to give earnest advice.
